channel.title: Mystery Science Theater 3000 (and other lesser TV comedies)
channel.description:
Sure, you have Whose Line Is it Anyway?, Monty Python's Flying Circus, The Muppet Show, or another fine comedy program. All fine, fine shows.
But can any really compare to the professional heckling of a man trapped in a satellite with robot companions?
I think Space Mutiny might be my favorite episode. ![mst3kmyspaceenforcer.jpg|300x189](upload://rqlSj3Rp58SqOTrh5dAio8OSSjg.jpeg)

item.title: Mystery Science Theater 3000 (and other lesser TV comedies)

item.description:
I like the Santa vs Satan episode, that’s my favourite.
